excerpt.rendered:
A highly rated 22 year old single cask from The Macallan. From the 2017 series, this is Cask 6 which is matured in a single European Sherry Oak Hogshead. This is bottled at 52.7% abv with only 281 bottles ever produced.

ESC 2017/ESH-5326/06
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Hogshead
Distilled: 26th April 1995
Bottled: 31 August 2017
One of 281 bottles

Cask number #5326

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 22
Vintage : 1995
ABV : 52.70%
